  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SlidingPanelListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    • Method Detail

      • getAllMaps

        java.util.ArrayList<MappedInMap> getAllMaps()
        Returns:
        All the MappedInMap objects for the currently displayed and loaded venue.

        This method will return an empty list if no venue has been initialized

      • getAllMapGroups

        java.util.ArrayList<android.util.Pair<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getAllMapGroups()
        Returns:
        A list of all Map Groups found within this venue. The Map Groups are organized in a Map Group ID with a Localized Map Group name Pair object

        This method will return an empty list if no venue has been initialized or there are no map groups

      • getCurrentMap

        MappedInMap getCurrentMap()
        Returns:
        The currently displayed map as a MappedInMap object.

        This method will return null no venue has been initialized yet

      • getMap

        MappedInMap getMap(java.lang.String mapId)
        Parameters:
        mapId - The ID for a MappedInMap object that you want to get.
        Returns:
        A MappedInMap object associated with the passed in Map ID

        This method will return null if there is no MappedInMap object associated with the passed in Map ID

      • getResources

        android.content.res.Resources getResources()

      • getNodePosition

        LatLng getNodePosition(MappedInNode node)

        MappedInMapActivity.MapState getMapState()

        boolean doesMapExist(java.lang.String mapId)

      • onEnterMapClick

        void onEnterMapClick(MappedInLocation location)

      • getMapNames

        java.lang.String getMapNames(MappedInLocation location)
        Use this method to get a list of all the map that this location is shown on or located at. This method checks all of the location's nodes to determine the list of map names.
        Parameters:
        location - The locations for whom's map names you want to get
        Returns:
        A localized string with map names separated properly

      • getMapName

        java.lang.String getMapName(java.lang.String mapId)
        Parameters:
        mapId - The ID for a MappedInMap object who's name you want to get
        Returns:
        The localized name for the map associated with the passed in Map ID.
